awards.title: Awarded Nepal Board Topper, TU, Vice Chancellor Award

timelines.title: Frontend Developer
timelines.description: FestPop is based on an aggregation business model. This means that music lovers can plan their entire festival experience using the site. This includes booking tickets and hotels to buying music festival gear to connecting with fellow music enthusiasts.
timelines.stack: reactjs, redux, redux-saga, react-router, nodejs, express, webpack, babel, sequelize, react-helmet, MySQL

timelines.title: Frontend Developer
timelines.description: Landed is a company with the mission to help essential professionals build financial security near the communities they serve. The company uses Reactjs, redux, react-router, redux-saga, nodejs etc as front-end technologies to build the Web Application. In addition to this, the company uses PostgreSQL to handle database.
timelines.stack: reactjs, redux, redux-saga, react-router, nodejs, express, webpack, babel, sequelize, react-helmet, PostgreSQL

timelines.title: Frontend Developer
timelines.description: 24estore is a Norwegian company that develops e-commerce solutions for customers around the world. The company uses Reactjs, redux, react-router, redux-saga, node etc as front-end technologies and Laravel for building API. The development team follows TDD paradigm and uses SCRUM as project management tool.
timelines.stack: reactjs, redux, redux-saga, react-router, nodejs, express, webpack, babel, sequelize, react-helmet, MySQL, docker, vagrant

timelines.title: Frontend Developer/Freelancer
timelines.description: Worked as full time (till 2014) and now part time freelancer in upwork, providing services like Website development and designing, WordPress theme development and customization, WordPress plugin development and customization, Web application development consulting services, Search Engine Optimization etc

timelines.title: Web Developer
timelines.description: Responsible of design and development of Learning Management System using WordPress in multisite environment. Developed ad-dons and plugins that are compatible with LearnDash LMS plugin that integrates with the system.

timelines.title: WordPress Developer
timelines.description: Remote Work. Development of websites using their theme framework PushPress developed for WordPress.
